overview: Two hour live concert.  16 not earlier released video clips (of tracks 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 11, 13, 14, 15, 19 & 21 of DVD1).  1 hidden video clip .  4 rare video clips from the early days (track 4, 5, 6 & 7 of DVD2).  Road movie of their German tour in 2003.  Interviews with the band, and with fans.  "Behind the scene" and backstage impressions.  Audio commentary by the band .  24 pages of tour diary.
title: Project Pitchfork - Live
